nl.tno.stormcv.operation

Interface IOperation<Output extends CVParticle>

  • Type Parameters:
    Output -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBatchOperation<Output>, ISingleInputOperation<Output>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorHistogramOp, DrawFeaturesOp, FeatureCombinerOp, FeatureExtractionOp, FrameGrouperOp, GrayscaleOp, GroupOfFramesOp, HaarCascadeOp, MjpegStreamingOp, OpenCVOp, OpticalFlowOp, ROIExtractionOp, ScaleImageOp, SequentialFrameOp, TilesRecombinerOp, TilingOp, VideoFileWriterOp

    public interface IOperation<Output extends CVParticle>
extends Serializable
    Basic interface for all operations within the platform.
    Author:
    Corne Versloot

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deactivate()
      Called when the topology is halted and can be used to clean up resources used

      Provides the CVParticleSerializer implementation to be used to serialize the output of the IOperation
      void prepare(Map stormConf, backtype.storm.task.TopologyContext context)
      Called when the topology is activated and can be used to configure itself and load resources required
